H0.text: when was the last time tug-of-war was an official olympic sport. 1908

H1.text: when was the last time tug-of-war was an official olympic sport. 1904

H2.text: when was the last time tug-of-war was an official olympic sport. 1900

H3.text: when was the last time tug-of-war was an official olympic sport. 1920

A4.text: Tug of War was contested in the Summer Olympics at the Games of every Olympiad from 1900 to 1920.

A5.text: After the 1920 Games, the International Olympic Committee decided to remove Tug of War from the Olympic program.
